text: @realDonaldTrump Funny , well not really at all, how over 113,000 US citizens  died from Covid-19  on your watch, because  just like bumbling Boris Johnson, you are the worst type  of person  to lead a Country  in a crisis and had-have no idea what to do apart from blame others. What a clown .
